biotools.summary: RLZ-Graph constructs a genome graph by first compressing the input sequences using the relative Lempel-Ziv algorithm. The input to RLZ-Graph is a set of complete genomic sequences stored in .fasta format.

bioschemas.name: RLZ-Graph
bioschemas.summary: RLZ-Graph constructs a genome graph by first compressing the input sequences using the relative Lempel-Ziv algorithm. The input to RLZ-Graph is a set of complete genomic sequences stored in .fasta format.
